Literature.Title: Development of Tyrocidine A analogues with improved antibacterial activity.
Literature.Author: Marques MA, Citron DM, Wang CC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis MRL 19010(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis MRL 17001(MIC=4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MRL 18734(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus cereus MRL 18731(MIC=4µg/ml)
